@009


caturthaM kozasthAnam

(4. karmanirdeza:)

karmajaM lokavaicitryaM, cetanA tatkRtaM ca tat |

cetanA mAnasaM karma, tajje vAkkAyakarmaNI ||1||

te tu vijJaptyavijJaptI kAyavijJaptiriSyate |

saMsthAnaM na gatiryasmAt saMskRtaM kSaNikaM vyayAt
||2||

na kasyacidaheto: syAddhetu: syAcca vinAzaka: |

dvigrAhyaM syAnna cA'Nau tad vAgvijJaptistu vAgdhvani:
||3||

trividhAmalarUpoktivRddhyakurvatpathAdibhi: |

kSaNAdUrdhamavijJapti: kAmAptAtItabhUtajA ||4||

svAni bhUtAnyupAdAya kAyavAkkarma sAsravam |

anAsravaM yatra jAto'vijJaptiranupAttikA ||5||

naiSyandikI ca sattvAkhyA niSyandopAttabhUtajA |

samAdhijaupacayikA nupAttAbhinnabhUtajA ||6||

nAvyAkRtAstyavijJaptistridhA'nyadazubhaM puna: |

kAme rUpe'pyavijJaptirvijJapti: savicArayo: ||7||

kAme'pi nivRtA nAsti samutthAnamasad yata: |

paramArthazubho mokSa: svato mUlahryapatrapA ||8||

samprayogeNa tadyuktA samutthAnAt kriyAdaya: |

viparyayeNAkuzalaM paramAvyAkRte dhruve ||9||

samutthAnaM dvidhA hetutatkSaNotthAnasaMjJitam |

pravartakaM tayorAdyaM, dvitIyamanuvartakam ||10||

pravartakaM dRSTiheyaM, vijJAnamubhayaM puna: |

mAnasaM bhAvanAheyaM, paJcakaM tvanuvartakam ||11||

pravartake zubhAdau hi syAt tridhApyanuvartakam |

tulyaM mune: zubhaM yAvat nobhayaM tu vipAkajam ||12||

avijJaptistridhA jJeyA saMvarAsaMvaretarA |

saMvara: prAtimokSAkhyo dhyAnajo'nAsravastathA ||13||

aSTadhA prAtimokSAkhyo dravyatastu caturvidha: |

liGgato nAmasaJcArAt pRthak te cAvirodhina: ||14||

paJcASTadazasarvebhyo varjyebhyo viratigrahAt |

upAsakopavAsasthazramaNoddezabhikSutA ||15||

@010

zIlaM sucaritaM karma-saMvarazcocyate puna: |

Adye vijJaptyavijJaptI prAtimokSa: kriyApatha: ||16||

prAtimokSAnvitA cASTau dhyAnajena tadanvita: |

anAsraveNAryasattvA antyau cittAnuvartinau ||17||

anAgamye prahANAkhyau tAvAnantaryamArgajau |

samprajAnasmRtI dve tu manaindriyasaMvarau ||18||

prAtimokSasthito nityamAtyAgAd vartamAnayA |

avijJaptyAnvita: pUrvAt kSaNAdUrdhvamatItayA ||19||

tathaivAsaMvarastho'pi dhyAnasaMvaravAn sadA |

atItAjAtayA''ryastu prathame nAbhyatItayA ||20||

samAhitAryamArgasthau tau yukto vartamAnayA |

madhyasthasyAsti cedAdau madhyayordhvaM dvikAlayA ||21||

asaMvarastha: zubhayA'zubhayA saMvare sthita: |

avijJaptyAnvito yAvat prasAdaklezavegavAn ||22||

vijJaptyA tu yutA: sarve kurvanto madhyayAnvitA: |

atItayA kSaNAdUrdhvamAtyAgAnnAstyajAtayA ||23||

nivRtAnivRtAbhyAM ca nAtItAbhyAM samanvita: |

asaMvaro duzcaritaM dau:zIlyaM karma tatpatha: ||24||

vijJaptyaivAnvita: kurvan madhyastho mRducetana: |

tyaktAnutpannavijJapti: avijJaptyAryapudgala: ||25||

dhyAnajo dhyAnabhUmyaiva labhyate'nAsravastayA |

AryayA prAtimokSAkhya: paravijJapanAdibhi: ||26||

yAvajjIvaM samAdAnamahorAtraM ca saMvRte: |

nAsaMvaro'styahorAtraM na kilaivaM pragRhyate ||27||

kAlyaM grAhyo'nyato nIcai: sthitenoktAnuvAdinA |

upavAsa: samagrAGgo nirbhUSeNAnizAkSayAt ||28||

zIlAGgAnyapramAdAGgaM vratAGgAni yathAkramam |

catvAryekaM tathA trINi smRtinAzo madazca tai: ||29||

anyasyApyupavAso'sti zaraNaM tvagatasya na |

upAsakatvopagamAt saMvRduktistu bhikSuvat ||30||

sarve cet saMvRtA ekadezakAryAdaya: katham |

tatpAlanAt kila proktA mRdvAditvaM yathA mana: ||31||

buddhasaGkarAn dharmAn azaikSAnubhayAMzca sa: |

nirvANaM caiti zaraNaM yo yAti zaraNatrayam ||32||

@011

mithyAcArAtigarhyatvAt saukaryAdakriyAptita: |

yathAbhyupagamaM lAbha: saMvarasya na santate: ||33||

mRSAvAdaprasaGgAcca sarvazikSAvyatikrame |

pratikSepaNasAvadyAt madyAdevAnyaguptaye ||34||

sarvobhayebhya: kAmApto vardhamAnebhya Apyate |

maulebhya: sarvakAlebhyo dhyAnAnAsravasaMvarau ||35||

saMvara: sarvasattvebhyo vibhASA tvaGgakAraNai: |

asaMvarastu sarvebhya: sarvAGgebhyo na kAraNai: ||36||

asaMvarasya kriyayA lAbho'bhyupagamena vA |

zeSAvijJaptilAbhastu kSetrAdAnAdarehaNAt ||37||

prAtimokSadamatyAga: zikSAnikSepaNAccyute: |

ubhayavyaJjanotpattermUlocchedAnnizAtyayAt ||38||

patanIyena cetyeke saddharmAntardhito'pare |

dhanarNavattu kAzmIrairApannasyeSyate dvayam ||39||

bhUmisaJcArahAnibhyAM dhyAnAptaM tyajyate zubham |

tathArUpyAptamAryaM tu phalAptyuttaptihAnibhi: ||40||

asaMvara: saMvarAptimRtyudvivyaJjanodayai: |

vegAdAnakriyArthAyurmUlacchedaistu madhyamA ||41||

kAmAptaM kuzalArUpaM mUlacchedordhvajanmata: |

pratipakSodayAt kliSTamarUpaM tu vihIyate ||42||

nRNAmasaMvaro hitvA SaNDhapaNDadvidhAkRtIn |

kurUMzca saMvaro'pyevaM devAnAM ca nRNAM traya:
||43||

kAmarUpajadevAnAM dhyAnajo'nAsrava: puna: |

dhyAnAntarAsaMjJisattvavarjyAnAmapyarUpiNAm ||44||

kSemAkSemetarat karma kuzalAkuzaletarat |

puNyApuNyamaniJjyaM ca sukhavedyAdi ca trayam ||45||

kAmadhAtau zubhaM karma puNyamAniJjyamUrdhvajam |

tadbhUmiSu yata: karma vipAkaM prati neJjati ||46||

sukhavedyaM zubhaM dhyAnAdAtRtIyAdata: param |

adu:khAsukhavedyaM tu du:khavedyamihAzubham ||47||

adho'pi madhyamastyeke dhyAnAntaravipAkata: |

apUrvAcarama: pAkastrayANAM ceSyate yata: ||48||

svabhAvasamprayogAbhyAmAlambanavipAkata: |

sammukhIbhAvatazceti paJcadhA vedanIyatA ||49||

@012

niyatAniyataM tacca niyataM trividhaM puna: |

dRSTadharmAdivedyatvAt paJcadhA karma kecana ||50||

catuSkoTikamityanye nikAyAkSepaNaM tribhi: |

sarvatra caturAkSepa: zubhasya narake tridhA ||51||

yadvirakta: sthiro bAlastatra notpadyavedyakRt |

nAnyavedyakRdapyArya: kAme'gre vAsthiro'pi na ||52||

dvAviMzatividaM kAmeSvAkSipatyantarAbhava: |

dRSTadharmaphalaM tacca nikAyo hyeka eva sa: ||53||

tIvraklezaprasAdena sAtatyena ca yatkRtam |

guNakSetre ca niyataM tat pitrorghAtakaM ca yat ||54||

dRSTadharmaphalaM karma kSetrAzayavizeSata: |

tadbhUmyatyantavairAgyAd vipAke niyataM hi yat ||55||

ye nirodhAraNAmaitrIdarzanArhatphalotthitA: |

teSu kArApakArANAM phalaM sadyo'nubhUyate ||56||

kuzalasyAvitarkasya karmaNo vedanA matA |

vipAkazcaitasikyeva kAyikyevAzubhasya tu ||57||

cittakSepo manazcitte sa ca karmavipAkaja: |

bhayopaghAtavaiSamyazokaizcAkurukAminAm ||58||

vaGkadoSakaSAyokti: zAThyadveSajarAgaje |

kRSNazuklAdibhedena puna: karma caturvidham ||59||

azubhaM rUpakAmAptaM zubhaM caiva yathAkramam |

kRSNazuklobhayaM karma tatkSayAya nirAsravam ||60||

dharmakSAntiSu vairAgye cAnantaryapathASTake |

yA cetanA dvAdazadhA karma kRSNakSayAya tat ||61||

navame cetanA yA sA kRSNazuklakSayAya ca |

zuklasya dhyAnavairAgyeSvAnantaryamArgajA ||62||

anye narakavedyAnyakAmavedyaM dvayaM vidu: |

dRgdheyaM kRSNamanye'nyat kRSNazuklaM tu kAmajam
||63||

azaikSaM kAyavAkkarma mAnazcaiva yathAkramam |

maunatrayaM tridhA zaucaM sarvaM sucaritatrayam ||64||

azubhaM kAyakarmAdi mataM duzcaritaM trayam |

akarmApi tvabhidhyAdi manoduzcaritaM tridhA ||65||

viparyayAt sucaritaM tadaudArikasaMgrahAt |

daza karmapathA uktA yathAyogaM zubhAzubhA: ||66||

@013

azubhA: SaDavijJaptirdvidhaikaste'pi kurvata: |

dvividhA: sapta kuzalA avijJapti: samAdhijA: ||67||

sAmantakAstu vijJaptiravijJaptirbhavenna vA |

viparyayeNa pRSThAni prayogastu trimUlaja: ||68||

tadanantarasambhUterabhidhyAdyAstrimUlajA: |

kuzalA: saprayogAntA alobhadveSamohajA: ||69||

(karmanirdeza:)

atha yadetat sattvabhAjanalokasya bahudhA vaicitryamuktaM tat
kena kRtam ? na

khalu kenacid buddhipUrvakaM kRtam | kiM tarhi ?

anAtmasaMjJinazca nirvANe zAntasaMjJina:

santiSThante; AtmocchedazaGkApagamAt" iti |
tadevamanandhA eva yAnti, nAndhA: | andhAstu

bhramantyeva saMsArArNave nairAtmyamapazyanta: |

nirvANameva puraM nirvANapuram | tasyaikA vartinIti
nirvANapuraikamArga: | nAnyo mArga ityartha: |

tathAgata evAdityo
gambhIradharmAbhiprakAzakatvAdAdityabhUtastathAgata:,
tasya vacAMsi tAnye-

tathAgatAdityavacoMzubhAsvatI | AryANAM

1. ekAyanatA, abhipretadezaprayANAt | 2. sAlokatA, yato
ni:zaGko gacchati | 3. yAtAnuyAtatA

tatsAdharmyeNeyaM nirAtmatAvartinI draSTavyA |

mandacakSuSkatayeti |

dRzyate | mArgadoSeNeti | yata eSa mandacakSu: etAM na

ityAha-

vraNadezo viSasyeva svasAmarthyavisarpiNa iti | yathA
